Name: Power of the Ancients
About the game: A mostly peaceful pixely isometric city builder with a bit of magic. Construct a pyramid as the center of your realm. Four different people live in the four quadrants of the pyramid. Fishermen, farmers, fire people, magicians. Gather resources, build homes, challenge demons and create a thriving city while preparing for winter.
